name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
September 21: Differents ways to say hello, introducing yourself, asking for some basic information, partner interview
September 28: Textbook lesson 1 - Hello, my name is...
October 5: Lesson 1 - Where are you from? What languages do you speak?
October 12: Lesson 1 - Doing a phone call
October 19: Lesson 1 - Hotel check-in, filling out forms
October 26: Lesson 1 - Review, test
November 2: Lesson 2 - Family and friends
November 9: Lesson 2 - Introducing family members
November 16: Lesson 2 - Are you married? Do you have kids?
November 23: Lesson 2 - Conjugating verbs, listening exercises
November 30: Lesson 2 - Reading postcards, review, test
December 7: Lesson 3 - Food and drinks
December 14: Lesson 3 - Plural forms, working with a dictionary, at the market
December 21: Lesson 3 - Asking for prices, special offers, measure words
December 28: Lesson 3 - In a restaurant, my favorite things
January 4: Lesson 3 - Dictation, review, test
January 11: Lesson 4 - My apartment
January 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
